## Structure submission checklist

- [ ] Added a folder under `structures/<slug>/`
- [ ] Included `meta.json`
- [ ] Included `preview.png`
- [ ] Included the structure file referenced in `meta.json`
- [ ] `meta.slug` matches the folder name
- [ ] I tested this in Recurrent Complex
